data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah, Saudi Arabia to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, it’s possible most of the 307,613 lost people in  Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah, Saudi Arabia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hui, Muslim Chinese people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.focus_label: Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah, Saudi Arabia

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Al Hudud ash Shamaliyah, Saudi Arabia to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
